title: I Need Help With My PBE Account
body: So i wanted to play on the PBE because i wanted to play a skin on this champ and i type in the username and password and it says "incorrect Password" i then click the "forgot your username" and send an email to my phone and i check my inbox and it won't send me a message can someone help please.

replies.body: That's pretty odd, I wonder if that e-mail is just taking its sweet time or if it was somehow changed. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your main account and they'll be able to get this sorted out on their end!
